    • getInstance

      public static Transactions getInstance()

      returns the only instance of this class

    • checkBalance

      public double checkBalance​(Customer userAccount, String accType) throws TransactionException
      handles the inquire balance procedure
      Parameters:
      userAccount - a users account used to return their balance, not user input
      accType - type of account searched for, is user input
      Returns:
      returns a balance of the accType provided
      Throws:
      TransactionException - exception for bad transaction

    • userDeposit

      public void userDeposit​(Customer userAccount, String acountType, double deposit) throws TransactionException
      handles a users deposit
      Parameters:
      userAccount - object containing Customer information
      acountType - account type where money is deposited to
      deposit - ammount of money deposited
      Throws:
      TransactionException - exception for bad transaction

    • accountTransfer

      public void accountTransfer​(Customer userAccount, String from, String to, double transfer) throws TransactionException
      handles a users account transfer(e.g checking to savings)
      Parameters:
      userAccount - Customer object containing user information
      from - account type money is transferred from
      to - account money is transferred to
      transfer - amount being transferred
      Throws:
      TransactionException - for bad transaction

    • userWithdraw

      public void userWithdraw​(Customer userAccount, String accType, double withdrawl) throws TransactionException
      handles a users withdraw procedure
      Parameters:
      userAccount - Customer object containing information about user
      accType - type of account user will withdraw from
      withdrawl - amount of money user wants to withdraw
      Throws:
      TransactionException - for bad transaction

    • transactionToOther

      public void transactionToOther​(Customer userAccount, Customer userToPay, String from, String to, double pay) throws TransactionException
      handles a user's transaction to another user
      Parameters:
      userAccount - Customer object containing all information
      userToPay - user that will receive money
      from - the type of account user uses to pay
      to - the type of account the user pays to
      pay - the amount being paid
      Throws:
      TransactionException - for bad transaction

    • buyFromMinerMall

      public void buyFromMinerMall​(Customer userAccount, String accType, double itemValue) throws TransactionException
      handles the purchase of a user from miners mall
      Parameters:
      userAccount - user account, not provided by user
      accType - account user will use, provided by user
      itemValue - the price of an Item user will buy, not provided by user
      Throws:
      TransactionException - for bad transaction
